mapper.select: SELECT lprofile, lgrade, ltitle, lprice, lopendate FROM lecture ORDER BY lopendate DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT lprofile, lgrade, ltitle, lprice FROM lecture l INNER JOIN purchase p ON l.lid = p.lid GROUP BY p.lid ORDER BY COUNT(p.lid) desc LIMIT 2

SELECT t.tid, tprofile, tsubject, tintro, ltitle, name FROM teacher t INNER JOIN lecture l ON t.tid = l.tid INNER JOIN purchase p ON l.lid = p.lid INNER JOIN user u ON t.uid = u.uid GROUP BY t.tid ORDER BY COUNT(p.lid) desc
